metadata.title: CVE-2021-45472 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In MediaWiki through 1.37, XSS can occur in Wikibase because an external identifier property can have a URL format that includes a $1 formatter substitution marker, and the javascript: URL scheme (among others) can be used.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
